byline.contributor: Falih Hassan contributed reporting from Baghdad.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The United Nations refugee agency is scrambling to build encampments for those who will be displaced in a fight to rout the Islamic State from Mosul.
snippet: The United Nations refugee agency is scrambling to build encampments for those who will be displaced in a fight to rout the Islamic State from Mosul....

headline.main: 1.2 Million Iraqis Could Be Uprooted in Mosul Battle, U.N. Says
